name: CommandBoundingBox
description: draw2d.command.CommandBoundingBox Set the bounding box of a figure with undo/redo support

functions.name: init
functions.description: Create a new Command objects which can be execute via the CommandStack.

functions.name: getLabel
functions.description: Returns a label of the Command. e.g. move figure.

functions.name: canExecute
functions.description: Returns [true] if the command can be execute and the execution of the command modifies the model. e.g.: a CommandMove with [startX,startX] == [endX,endY] should return false. The execution of this Command doesn't modify the model.

returns.description: return try if the command modify the model or make any relevant changes

functions.name: execute
functions.description: Execute the command the first time. Sup-classes must implement this method.

functions.name: cancel
functions.description: Will be called if the user cancel the operation.

functions.name: undo
functions.description: Undo the command. Sup-classes must implement this method.

functions.name: redo
functions.description: Redo the command after the user has undo this command. Sup-classes must implement this method.
